header_text: You are taking a dancing class and, during a break, find yourself talking to a newcomer about your job. As you chat, you notice that you are sweating. They probably assume this is a result of dancing.

elements.Text: Did the person you met at dance class think you were anxious?

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
